vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παραγγ-ελία, ἡ,
command or order issued to soldiers, [NT+5th c.BC+]; τόπος ἐπιτηδειότατος εἰς π. for giving the word of command, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]: generally, order issued by an authority, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II summoning one's partisans to support one in a suit at law, exertion of influence, σπουδὴ καὶ π., συγγνώμη καὶ π., [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.2 summons to appear in court, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II.3 canvassing for public office, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__III set of rules or precepts, ὑπὸ παραγγελίαν πίπτειν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; instruction, precept, advice, [NT+5th c.BC+]; τεχνίτης π. λογικῆς, of rules of literary composition, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
order, command; instruction
a command, order, charge, Acts 5:28; 16:24; direction, precept, instruction 1Thess. 4:2; 1Tim. 1:5, 18*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 命令, 指令, 規律, 勸勉
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 命令, 指令, 规律, 劝勉
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: lệnh, lịnh đó, chỉ lệnh; sự răn bảo
